class.name: InputMatrix
class.documentation: This object contains this attributes to set how to interpret data stored in 2-dimensional arrays in memory.

parameter.name: input_field
parameter.documentation: Array containing data for contouring

parameter.name: input_simple_field
parameter.documentation: For internal testing only, or very specifivc users request!

parameter.name: input_wind_u_component
parameter.documentation: Array containing U velocity component for wind field

parameter.name: input_wind_v_component
parameter.documentation: Array containing V velocity component for wind field

parameter.name: input_field_organization
parameter.documentation: How data is organized in the input field (REGULAR /IRREGULAR/)

parameter.name: input_field_subpage_mapping
parameter.documentation: Position of first point of array (1,1) on the subpage, (see text)(UPPER_LEFT / UPPER_RIGHT / LOWER_LEFT / LOWER_RIGHT / UPPER_LEFT_TRANSPOSED / UPPER_RIGHT_TRANSPOSED / LOWER_LEFT_TRANSPOSED / LOWER_RIGHT_TRANSPOSED)

parameter.name: input_wind_speed
parameter.documentation: Array containing speed component for wind field

parameter.name: input_wind_direction
parameter.documentation: Array containing direction component for wind field

parameter.name: input_field_suppress_below
parameter.documentation: Values in the input field(s) below this value are to be suppressed, i.e. not to be taken into consideration for plotting purposes

parameter.name: input_field_suppress_above
parameter.documentation: Values in the input field(s) above this value are to be suppressed, i.e not to be taken into consideration for plotting purposes

parameter.name: input_field_latitudes
parameter.documentation: latitudes

parameter.name: input_field_longitudes
parameter.documentation: longitudes

parameter.name: input_field_y_coordinates
parameter.documentation: y-coordinates of the field

parameter.name: input_field_x_coordinates
parameter.documentation: x-coordinates of the field

parameter.name: input_field_initial_latitude
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Latitude of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_longitude
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Longitude of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_latitude_step
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Distance between two latitude points in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_longitude_step
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Distance between two longitude points in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_y
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_x
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_y
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_x_list
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: vector containing the x-coordinates

parameter.name: input_field_y_list
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: vector containing the y-coordinates

parameter.name: input_field_initial_x
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_y_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_x_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_y_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_x_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_y_step
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-step in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_x_step
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-step in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_primary_index
parameter.documentation: Primary or first index of input array(LATITUDE/LONGITUDE)

parameter.name: input_field_gradient_control
parameter.documentation: How to calculate the contour gradients(LEAST/FLAT_ONLY/OFF)

parameter.name: input_field_gradient_limitation
parameter.documentation: Set gradient to 0 for minimum and/or maximum values(MINIMUM/MAXIMUM/BOTH/OFF)
